value.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery
value.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your Azure infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of Azure virtual machines with Azure Site Recovery.

images.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery

value.title: Protect your on-premises infrastructure from disasters with Azure Site Recovery
value.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your on-premises infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of VMware virtual machines, Hyper-V virtual machines, and physical servers with Azure Site Recovery.

images.title: Protect your on-premises infrastructure from disasters with Azure Site Recovery

value.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning to train a model and register it in a workspace.

images.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Transform data by using Azure Stream Analytics
value.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure Stream Analytics jobs to process input data, transform it with a query, and return results.

images.title: Transform data by using Azure Stream Analytics

value.title: Tune hyperparameters with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Choosing optimal hyperparameter values for model training can be difficult, and usually involved a great deal of trial and error. With Azure Machine Learning, you can leverage cloud-scale experiments to tune hyperparameters.

images.title: Tune hyperparameters with Azure Machine Learning

value.title: Work with mutable and partial data in Azure Cache for Redis
value.excerpt: Use Azure Cache for Redis to store frequently accessed data. Learn how to create transactions, manage memory, and use the cache-aside pattern.

images.title: Work with mutable and partial data in Azure Cache for Redis

value.title: Azure Data Fundamentals: Explore modern data warehouse analytics in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of database concepts in a cloud environment, get basic skilling in cloud data services, and build your foundational knowledge of cloud data services within Microsoft Azure. You will explore the processing options available for building data analytics solutions in Azure. You will explore Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Databricks, and Azure HDInsight.

topItems.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse
topItems.excerpt: Examine the components of a modern data warehouse. Understand the role of services like Azure Databricks, Azure Synapse Analytics, and Azure HDInsight. See how to use Azure Synapse Analytics to load and process data.

images.title: Examine components of a modern data warehouse

topItems.title: Explore data ingestion in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore the different data ingestion options available when you are building a data warehouse with Azure. See how to use Azure Data Factory to ingest data into a data warehouse.

images.title: Explore data ingestion in Azure

topItems.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Explore Azure services for performing data analytics, and explore the features of Azure Synapse Analytics.

images.title: Explore data storage and processing in Azure
Examine components of a modern data warehouse

value.title: Introduction to machine learning with Python and Azure Notebooks
value.excerpt: Python has become a dominant language for doing data analysis with machine learning. Learn how to leverage Python and associated libraries in Jupyter Notebooks run on Azure Notebooks to predict patterns and identify trends.

topItems.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks
topItems.excerpt: Create an Azure Notebook and use three popular Python libraries to analyze climate data collected by NASA, then share it.

images.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

topItems.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python
topItems.excerpt: Import airline arrival data into a Jupyter notebook and use Pandas to clean it. Then, build a machine learning model with Scikit-Learn and use Matplotlib to visualize output.

images.title: Predict flight delays by creating a machine learning model in Python

topItems.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
topItems.excerpt: Keras is a high-level neural networks API, written in Python, that runs on top of other deep learning tools such as TensorFlow. This module uses Keras to build a neural network that scores text, such as user reviews for sentiment.

images.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

value.title: Large-Scale Data Processing with Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2
value.excerpt: In this learning path, you will see how Azure Data Lake Storage can make processing Big Data analytical solutions more efficient and how easy it is to set up. You will also explore how it fits into common architectures, as well as the different methods of uploading the data to the data store. You will finally examine the myriad of security features that will ensure your data is secure.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Data Lake Storage provides a cloud storage service that is highly available, secure, durable, scalable, and redundant and brings new efficiencies to processing big data analytics workloads.

images.title: Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage

topItems.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage
topItems.excerpt: Learn various ways to upload data to Data Lake Storage Gen 2. Upload data through the Azure portal, Azure Storage Explorer, or .NET. Or copy the data in Azure Data Factory.

images.title: Upload data to Azure Data Lake Storage

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data. Find out how to use access keys, to secure networks, and to use Advanced Threat Protection to proactively monitor your system.

images.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
Introduction to Azure Data Lake storage

value.title: Process and classify images with the Azure Cognitive Vision Services
value.excerpt: Microsoft Cognitive Services offers pre-built functionality to enable computer vision functionality in your applications.  Learn how to use the Cognitive Vision Services to detect faces, tag and classify images, and identify objects.

topItems.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the Computer Vision API in Azure that allows you to identify facial details in pictures.

images.title: Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services

topItems.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
topItems.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

images.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service

topItems.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
topItems.excerpt: Create, train and test a custom image classification model using the Custom Vision Service to accurately identify paintings from famous artists.

images.title: Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service
Identify faces and expressions by using the Computer Vision API in Azure Cognitive Services

value.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Add your custom domain to Azure Active Directory. Add DNS information to the domain registrar. Verify your custom domain name in the Azure portal and set it as the primary.

images.title: Add custom domain name to Azure Active Directory

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in financial services
value.excerpt: To realize the true transformational impact of AI in financial services, decision-makers must consider the special factors that apply only to their industry. To create real business value, a comprehensive understanding of all the strategic components is required.

images.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in financial services

value.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in manufacturing
value.excerpt: In manufacturing, decision-makers must take into account specific industry considerations before they can realize the true transformational power of AI in the enterprise. To create real business value, a comprehensive understanding of all the strategic components is required.

images.title: Define an AI strategy to create business value in manufacturing

value.title: Authenticate apps to Azure services by using service principals and managed identities for Azure resources
value.excerpt: Securely authenticate applications to Azure to manage and access Azure services. Service principals and managed identities for Azure resources give your app an Azure Active Directory identity.

images.title: Authenticate apps to Azure services by using service principals and managed identities for Azure resources

value.title: Enable automatic updates in a web application using Azure Functions and SignalR Service
value.excerpt: Update a web app's notification mechanism from polling to push-based architecture with SignalR Service, Azure Cosmos DB and Azure Functions.

value.title: Azure Spring Cloud workshop
value.excerpt: In this workshop, you'll go through tasks to deploy Spring Boot microservices to Azure Spring Cloud (ASC).

images.title: Azure Spring Cloud workshop

value.title: Secure your data with Azure SQL
value.excerpt: Secure your data with Azure SQL

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence
value.excerpt: Learn how to design an Azure architecture that uses modern practices and gives you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
value.excerpt: Scaling your system to handle load, identifying network bottlenecks, and optimizing your storage performance are important to ensure your users have the best experience. Learn how to make your application perform at its best.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency

value.title: Back up and restore your Azure SQL database
value.excerpt: Protect the data in your Azure SQL database and recover from data loss or corruption with backup and restore.

images.title: Back up and restore your Azure SQL database

value.title: Choose a compute provisioning solution for your application
value.excerpt: Discover the services and tools available to automate the deployment and configuration of your Azure infrastructure.

images.title: Choose a compute provisioning solution for your application

value.title: Classify images with the Custom Vision service
value.excerpt: Image classification is a common workload in artificial intelligence (AI) applications. It harnesses the predictive power of machine learning to enable AI systems to identify real-world items based on images.

images.title: Classify images with the Custom Vision service

value.title: Monitor cloud resources
value.excerpt: Monitoring how your cloud resources are performing is crucial to building reliable cloud applications. This module covers what monitoring is, why you need to do it, and how you can about monitoring your resources.

images.title: Monitor cloud resources

value.title: Understand virtualization
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Take a deep dive into virtualization by understanding its formal definition as well as the different types of virtual machines.

value.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service
value.excerpt: Use the Computer Vision API to analyze images for insights, extract text from images, and generate high-quality thumbnails.

images.title: Process images with the Computer Vision service

value.title: Orchestrating machine learning with pipelines
value.excerpt: Orchestrating machine learning training with pipelines is a key element of DevOps for machine learning. In this module, you'll learn how to create, publish, and run pipelines to train models in Azure Machine Learning.

value.title: Create a release pipeline in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Set up a continuous delivery (CD) pipeline that automates the process of deploying your application.

images.title: Create a release pipeline in Azure Pipelines

value.title: Microsoft data estate migration and modernization
value.excerpt: Establishing a modern data estate is a foundational step toward digital transformation. A modern data estate enables timely insights and decision making across all your data, and sets the foundation for AI. A data estate is all of the data an organization owns. When you migrate this data to the cloud or modernize your environment on-premises you can gain important insights to fuel innovation.

images.title: Microsoft data estate migration and modernization

value.title: Explore data ingestion in Azure
value.excerpt: Explore the different data ingestion options available when you are building a data warehouse with Azure. See how to use Azure Data Factory to ingest data into a data warehouse.

images.title: Explore data ingestion in Azure

value.title: Host your domain on Azure DNS
value.excerpt: Create a DNS zone for your domain name. Create DNS records to map the URL to an IP address. Test that the domain name resolves to your web server.

images.title: Host your domain on Azure DNS
